>_Software Developer





Hello/Bonjour, my name is Rachel. I'm a software developer with a passion for learning. I work @ University of Toronto Libraries & sometimes teach and speak. As I teach myself new things, I also enjoy sharing my knowledge with others as an instructor @ The Carpentries . If I'm not in front of a keyboard, I might be organizing a Code4Lib Toronto event.
